alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 1:48PM AKST until February 25 at 10:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow and blowing snow expected. Additional accumulation of up to one inch possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will reduce visibility to below a mile at times. * WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions will gradually improve through the late evening.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
